text: The Sri Lankan Ambassador to Brazil is the Sri Lankan envoy to Brazil. The Sri Lankan Ambassador to Brazil is concurrently accredited as Ambassador to Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Peru and Suriname. The current ambassador is General Jagath Jayasuriya.Nine new ambassadors appointed ==Former ambassadors== * Mahinda Balasuriya * Hamilton Shirley Amerasinghe * Rohan Daluwatte * Shantha Kottegoda ==See also== *List of heads of missions from Sri Lanka ==References== * Sri Lanka Ambassadors Brazil
